## About

I am a fourth year Finance Student at the University of Alberta. Throughout my time at the Alberta School of Business, I have gained valuable experience through co-op and internships, as well as through my coursework at the University.

## Focus

As I complete the final year of my degree, I am focusing on completing increasingly complex challenges in my coursework and extracurricular activities.

## Principles

When engaged in professionally related tasks, I hold the principles of discipline, respect, detail, punctuality, integrity, and productive collaboration in high regard.

## Professional Interests

My professional interests include trading, financial research, and data analytics/programming with respect to financial decision making and problem solving.

## Personal Interests

My personal interests include playing guitar with a focus on improvisation and creating covers, playing hockey, playing board games, fitness, and comedy.
